abstract: New York State orders New York City to hire independent monitor to oversee city's Administration for Children's Services following several deaths of young children; city and state reports reveal lapses by agency in case of Zymere Perkins, 6-year-old who was fatally beaten in September.

headline.print_headline: State Orders New York City to Hire Child Welfare Monitor
headline.main: State Orders Monitor for New York City’s Child Welfare Agency

keywords.value: Office of Children and Family Services (NYS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The action is the latest fallout from the recent deaths of children who had been the subjects of abuse reports to the Administration for Children’s Services....
lead_paragraph: The action is the latest fallout from the recent deaths of children who had been the subjects of abuse reports to the Administration for Children’s Services.
